questions.question: What does the NOT NULL constraint ensure?
Which SQL clause sets a default value for a column?
Which statement is valid for enforcing NOT NULL?
Can a column with NOT NULL constraint accept null values?
What is the default behavior of a column without NOT NULL?
What is the purpose of DEFAULT constraint?
options: Assign a value automatically if not provided
questions.answer: Assign a value automatically if not provided

questions.question: Which data type supports NOT NULL and DEFAULT together?
Is it mandatory to define DEFAULT for a column?
Which constraint prevents a column from storing null values?
What will happen if no value is given to a DEFAULT column?
Create a column `created_at` with default value as today's date.
Add NOT NULL to an existing column `username` in `users` table.
options: ALTER TABLE users MODIFY username VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE users SET username NOT NULL;
MODIFY TABLE users username NOT NULL;
ALTER users TABLE ADD NOT NULL username;
questions.answer: ALTER TABLE users MODIFY username VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL;

questions.question: Add DEFAULT 0 to the `discount` column.
options: ALTER TABLE products MODIFY discount INT DEFAULT 0;
ALTER TABLE products ADD DEFAULT 0 TO discount;
questions.answer: ALTER TABLE products MODIFY discount INT DEFAULT 0;

questions.question: Which column definition sets a default value of 'guest'?
How to ensure `email` is always provided while inserting?
Create a column `status` with default 'active' and not null.
Which column definition allows default 1 and prevents null?
How to define a date column with no nulls and default value?
options: created_on DATE NOT NULL DEFAULT CURDATE()
created_on NOT NULL DATE DEFAULT CURDATE()
questions.answer: created_on DATE NOT NULL DEFAULT CURDATE()

questions.question: Insert into column with default value by skipping it in INSERT.
Add a NOT NULL constraint on `price` column of `items`.
options: ALTER TABLE items MODIFY price FLOAT NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE items SET price = NOT NULL;
MODIFY TABLE items price NOT NULL;
ALTER price SET NOT NULL ON items;
questions.answer: ALTER TABLE items MODIFY price FLOAT NOT NULL;

questions.question: Create a table where `role` defaults to 'user'.
options: CREATE TABLE accounts (id INT, role VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'user');
CREATE TABLE accounts (id INT, role DEFAULT 'user');
CREATE TABLE accounts (id INT, DEFAULT role = 'user');
CREATE TABLE accounts (id INT, role VARCHAR DEFAULT user);
questions.answer: CREATE TABLE accounts (id INT, role VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'user');

questions.question: Modify an existing column to have a default of 100.
options: ALTER TABLE products MODIFY stock INT DEFAULT 100;
questions.answer: ALTER TABLE products MODIFY stock INT DEFAULT 100;

questions.question: Ensure column `rating` always has a value when inserting data.
Which is correct for column with NOT NULL and DEFAULT 0?
Add NOT NULL to column `description` in table `products`.
options: ALTER TABLE products MODIFY description TEXT NOT NULL;
ALTER products ADD NOT NULL description;
MODIFY TABLE products SET NOT NULL description;
ALTER COLUMN description TEXT NOT NULL;
questions.answer: ALTER TABLE products MODIFY description TEXT NOT NULL;

questions.question: Create column `count` which must always have a number.
Set a default value of 5 for integer column `priority`.
Why use DEFAULT constraint in a column?
options: To provide fallback value if no input given
questions.answer: To provide fallback value if no input given

questions.question: Which is valid to define `status` column with 'pending' default?
